org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.session

Class SessionResourceUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.session.SessionResourceUtil

  • public class SessionResourceUtil
extends Object
    A Util class with common functions used by SessionResource, SessionResourceV2 and ActionHandlers

    • Constructor Detail

      • SessionResourceUtil

        @Inject
public SessionResourceUtil(SSOTokenManager ssoTokenManager,
                                   SessionQueryManager sessionQueryManager,
                                   WebtopNamingQuery webtopNamingQuery)
        Creates an instance of the SessionResourceUtil
        Parameters:
        ssoTokenManager - An instance of the SSOTokenManager.
        sessionQueryManager - An instance of the SessionQueryManager. Must not null.
        webtopNamingQuery - An Instance of the WebtopNamingQuery.

    • Method Detail

      • getTokenWithoutResettingIdleTime

        public SSOToken getTokenWithoutResettingIdleTime(String tokenId)
                                          throws SSOException
        tokenId may, or may not, specify a valid token. If it does, retrieve it and the carefully refresh it so as not to alter its idle time setting. If it does not exist, or is invalid, throw an SSOException.
        Parameters:
        tokenId - The id of the token to retrieve and cautiously refresh
        Returns:
        a valid SSOToken
        Throws:
        SSOException - if the token id does not identify a valid token

      • getAllServerIds

        public Collection<String> getAllServerIds()
        Returns a collection of all Server ID that are known to the OpenAM instance.
        Returns:
        A non null, possibly empty collection of server ids.

      • generateNamedServerSession

        public Collection<SessionInfo> generateNamedServerSession(String serverId)
        Parameters:
        serverId - Server to query.
        Returns:
        A non null collection of SessionInfos from the named server.

      • generateAllSessions

        public Collection<SessionInfo> generateAllSessions()
        Returns:
        A non null collection of SessionInfo instances queried across all servers.

      • jsonValueOf

        public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue jsonValueOf(SSOToken ssoToken)
                                         throws IdRepoException,
                                                SSOException
        Creates the JsonValue representing the single sign on token
        Parameters:
        ssoToken - The single sign on token
        Returns:
        The json value representation
        Throws:
        IdRepoException - If single sign on token is invalid
        SSOException - If single sign on token does not have a valid identifier

      • getIdentity

        public AMIdentity getIdentity(SSOToken ssoToken)
                       throws IdRepoException,
                              SSOException
        Creates a AMIdentity from the specified SSOToken.
        Parameters:
        ssoToken - The SSOToken.
        Returns:
        The AMIdentity.
        Throws:
        IdRepoException - If a problem occurs creating the AMIdentity.
        SSOException - If a problem occurs creating the AMIdentity.

      • convertDNToRealm

        public String convertDNToRealm(String orgName)
        Returns realm name in "/" separated format for the provided realm/organization name in DN format. Null or empty orgName would return "/"
        Parameters:
        orgName - Name of organization.
        Returns:
        DN format "/" separated realm name of organization name.

      • jsonValueOf

        public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue jsonValueOf(SessionInfo session)
        Creates the JsonValue representing the SessionInfo
        Parameters:
        session - The session Info
        Returns:
        The json value representing the SessionInfo

      • invalidSession

        public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue invalidSession()
        Creates a json representation to denote invalis session
        Returns:
        The json representing invalis session

      • getTokenID

        public static String getTokenID(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context,
                                org.forgerock.json.resource.Request request)
        Returns the token ID of the session or as a parameter. The token ID may come from a header, a cookie or a URL parameter.
        Parameters:
        context - The request context.
        request - The request.
        Returns:
        The token ID of the session or as a parameter. Null is returned if there is no token ID.

      • getTokenIdFromHeader

        public static String getTokenIdFromHeader(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context,
                                          String cookieName)
        Returns the token ID of the session, from a given header.
        Parameters:
        context - The request context.
        cookieName - The name of the header to extract the token from.
        Returns:
        The token ID of the session. Null is returned if there is no token ID.

      • getTokenIdFromCookie

        public static String getTokenIdFromCookie(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context,
                                          String cookieName)
        Returns the token ID of the session, from a cookie.
        Parameters:
        context - The request context.
        cookieName - The name of the cookie to extract the token from.
        Returns:
        The token ID of the session. Null is returned if there is no token ID.
